content: I've been thinking about getting a parka-style coat, and I saw that The North Face has a Thermoball Parka that's around $170. Do you think that's a good option, or should I consider other brands like Patagonia or Uniqlo? By the way, I've been loving my distressed denim jeans from H&M - they're so comfortable and versatile! I've worn them at least five times since I got them.
